name: Jumping Bird (styl0o)
description:
hello guys, 

-It's a funny little game that i made,

-which is basically a randomly generated game.

controls:

-You can jump or fly by clicking with your mouse or press space , 

-pause button on top of the screen or press escape if you are not in full screen mode.

ControlsWindows, macmobile devicejumpspace  || left clicktap the screen goal:

-The goal is simple : survive as long as u can,

-this will get harder as long as you survive,

-you can collect watermelons to restore your health,

-when the time count is over, you will lose one health.

advise:

-Recommended to play in full screen mode for quality optimization.

-If the first loading is too long try to refresh or try to close window that contains videos like yt(it worked for some guys).

-If you want to play with your mobile device it could not work, it works only on high ended devices.(like samsung galaxy S10203 ++ Pro Max  looool)

support:

-Don't forget to check credits section.

-If you want to support me, follow my twitter account:

https://twitter.com/Styl0o_

-Thanks to FreshMountain for testing the game ;)

hope your will enjoy :) -Styl0o_-
